underlying_goal: Diagnose and resolve a 'Request too large (max 20MB)' error occurring in Claude Code when working in their project repository
friction_detail: One minor command error during file size enumeration, but otherwise smooth investigation.
brief_summary: User hit a 20MB request limit error in Claude Code; Claude investigated extensively and identified 31MB of tracked Playwright test artifacts as the root cause, producing a remediation plan but not yet implementing the fix.
